methods.name: getDirectSignal
javadoc: @deprecated call via {@link IBlockState#getStrongPower(IBlockAccess,BlockPos,EnumFacing)} whenever possible. Implementing/overriding is fine.

methods.name: getSignal
javadoc: @deprecated call via {@link IBlockState#getWeakPower(IBlockAccess,BlockPos,EnumFacing)} whenever possible. Implementing/overriding is fine.

methods.name: isSignalSource
javadoc: Can this block provide power. Only wire currently seems to have this change based on its state.
@deprecated call via {@link IBlockState#canProvidePower()} whenever possible. Implementing/overriding is fine.
